      Returns:

    • setSelectedBehavior

      protected Command setSelectedBehavior(String behavior)
      Updates the selected behavior SendableChooser<Command>, as if it was changed from the dashboard. This is done with a StringPublisher pointing to the SendableChooser selected string.
      Parameters:
      behavior - which option to select.
      Returns:
      a command that updated the selected behavior.

    • setState

      protected SmartOpponent setState(String state)
      Sets the current state of the robot. This waits its turn patiently for the command to finish.
      Parameters:
      state - The state to set.
      Returns:
      this, for chaining.

    • runState

      protected Command runState(String state, boolean forceState)
      Runs a state as a command.
      Parameters:
      state - The state to run.
      forceState - Whether to force the state to run even if it is already running.
      Returns:
      The command to run the state.

      public Pair<String,Pose2d> getTarget()
      Gets the opponent's current active target pose.
      Returns:
      either the opponent target pose or null if there is no active target.

    • drive

      protected Command drive(Supplier<ChassisSpeeds> chassisSpeeds, boolean fieldCentric)
      A Command to drive the SmartOpponent. Meant to be used for joystick drives.
      Parameters:
      chassisSpeeds - speeds supplier to run the robot.
      Returns:
      Command to drive the SmartOpponent.

    • getRandomFromMap

      protected Pair<String,Pose2d> getRandomFromMap(Map<String,Pose2d> poseMap)
      Gets a random pose from a map. If the map is empty reports an error and returns null.
      Parameters:
      poseMap - The map to get a pose from.
      Returns:
      A random pose from the map.

    • getTargetFromMap

      protected Pair<String,Pose2d> getTargetFromMap(Map<String,Pose2d> poseMap)
      Gets a random pose from a map. If the map is empty returns null.
      Parameters:
      poseMap - The map to get a pose from.
      Returns:
      A random pose from the map, unless empty.

    • getScoringTarget

      protected Pair<String,Pose2d> getScoringTarget()
      Gets a random scoring target based on pose weights.
      Returns:
      a random scoring target based on pose weights.

      protected Pair<String,Pose2d> getCollectTarget()
      Gets a random collect target based on pose weights.
      Returns:
      a random collect target based on pose weights.

    • nearPose

      public boolean nearPose(Pose2d pose, Distance tolerance, Angle angleTolerance)
      Checks if the SmartOpponent is near the given pose within a given tolerance.
      Parameters:
      pose - the pose to check against.
      tolerance - the translation tolerance in Distance.
      angleTolerance - the rotation tolerance in Angle.
      Returns:

    • isMoving

      public boolean isMoving(LinearVelocity tolerance)
      Checks if the SmartOpponent is moving within the given tolerance. This checks only the linear velocity.
      Parameters:
      tolerance - the movement speed tolerance in LinearVelocity.
      Returns:
      true if the robot is moving faster than the given tolerance.

    • notMovingFor

      public boolean notMovingFor(Time elapsedTime)
      Checks if the SmartOpponent has not been moving for given time.
      Parameters:
      elapsedTime - how long the robot should be stuck for.
      Returns:
      true if the robot has been stopped for the elaspedTime.

    • ifShouldFlip

      protected Pose2d ifShouldFlip(Pose2d pose)
      If robot is red, returns pose as is. If the robot is blue, it returns the flipped pose.
      Parameters:
      pose - The pose to flip.
      Returns:
      The flipped pose.
